sqlMap.select:
SELECT B.* FROM (SELECT A.*,rownum as rnum FROM (SELECT row_number()over (ORDER BY seq ASC) as rown,seq,board_chk,title,content,readcount,rp_seq, to_char(write_date , 'YYYY-MM-DD') as write_date,brc_id, (select count(*) as rp_cnt from board rp where exists(select * from board where rp.rp_seq=bd.seq)) AS rp_cnt FROM board bd WHERE rp_seq = 0 AND board_chk = #board_chk#
AND title like '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
AND content like '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
AND brc_id like '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY rown DESC ) A ) B
WHERE #startNum# <= rnum AND rnum <= #endNum#

SELECT brc_id,b.seq,b.title, b.content, b.readcount, b.write_date, b.filename , c.brc_name , brc_id , (SELECT LPAD(REGEXP_SUBSTR(write_ip, '[^.]+', 1, 1), 3, ' ') || '.' || LPAD(REGEXP_SUBSTR(write_ip, '[^.]+', 1, 2), 3, ' ') || '.' || LPAD(REGEXP_SUBSTR(write_ip, '[^.]+', 1, 3), 3, ' ') || '.' || 'XXX' as write_ip FROM (SELECT write_ip FROM board WHERE seq = #seq# ) ) as write_ip FROM board b join branch c USING (brc_id) WHERE b.seq = #seq#

SELECT brc_id, REPLACE(CONTENT, chr(13)||chr(10), '
') AS CONTENT , write_date, write_ip, seq FROM board WHERE rp_seq = #rp_seq# ORDER BY seq ASC
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO board(seq, board_chk, title, content, brc_id, write_ip, rp_seq) VALUES(board_seq.nextval,2 ,'notitle' ,#content#, #brc_id#, #write_ip#, #seq#)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE board SET readcount = readcount + 1 WHERE seq = #seq#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT nvl(min(seq), #seq#) as next_seq FROM BOARD
WHERE seq > #seq# AND board_chk=#board_chk# AND rp_seq = 0

SELECT nvl(max(seq),#seq#) as prev_seq FROM BOARD
WHERE seq < #seq# AND board_chk=#board_chk# AND rp_seq = 0
sqlMap.update: UPDATE board SET title = #title# , content = #content#, filename = #filename# WHERE seq = #seq#
